body:
For the past two days, the Avicus TS has crashed. Why is the avicus TS crashing? And what is wrong with music bot? 

Get well soon botty.
body_tagged:
For the past two days, the Avicus TS has crashed. Why is the avicus TS crashing? And what is wrong with music bot?

title: Issue with TS.

replies.body: The Teamspeak is currently fine. It's not crashing. For the Music Bot issue, you'll have to talk to AtditC.
replies.body_tagged: The Teamspeak is currently fine. It's not crashing. For the Music Bot issue, you'll have to talk to AtditC.

replies.body: it was my dank memes, they were too much for TS
replies.body_tagged: it was my dank memes, they were too much for TS

replies.body: There's a very good chance that the "crashing" was on your side, perhaps you losing connection.
replies.body_tagged: There's a very good chance that the "crashing" was on your side, perhaps you losing connection.

replies.body: Nope, the whole TS server went down no one could go on for 5 mins
replies.body_tagged: Nope, the whole TS server went down no one could go on for 5 mins

reply_to.body: There's a very good chance that the "crashing" was on your side, perhaps you losing connection.

replies.body: Oh, I see what you mean. That's on the server-side with some issues, and we are fixing them right now.

And I can mute and ban people now?
